body_html: @juuh42dias No, there is actually another problem. The students have two teams, because they applied twice: in 2016 and 2017. They have been accepted this year. Now when they try to write daily logs, the logs get associated with their team of 2016.

body: @juuh42dias No, there is actually another problem. The students have two teams, because they applied twice: in 2016 and 2017. They have been accepted this year. Now when they try to write daily logs, the logs get associated with their team of 2016.
